messages.text: I’m about to buy a new computer, I’m interested in the general consensus regarding whether to go intel or amd?   And at what level?  My current plan is to go with a 10th gen i9, although I’m not sure what the price point of the 11th gen will be.  My reasons for going for intel over one of the ryzens is that intel is better suited for numerical computation with the MKL etc.  Is that the case?
